post:
Hi Folks,

The first Inception Hosting Virtuozzo 7 node is live, it ran through a beta test problem free, after going live I have had a few people running Docker that have Docker experience and reporting back to make sure everything is as expected so far so good :)

So its about time for a proper launch with a proper discount.

**50% off and double disk!**

**Select Annual pricing during check out.**

**2GB Ram**

* 2 vCPU Cores
* 1GB vSWAP
* 50GB Disk **Doubled to 100GB after provisioned**
* 1000 GB Bandwidth
* 1 x IPv4
* 1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet

€21 p/YEAR https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=123

<hr/>

**3GB Ram**

* 2 vCPU Cores
* 1GB vSWAP
* 75GB Disk **Doubled to 150GB after provisioned**
* 1500 GB Bandwidth
* 1 x IPv4
* 1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet

€33 p/YEAR https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=124


<hr/>


**4GB Ram**

* 100GB Disk **Doubled to 200GB after provisioned**
* 2000 GB Bandwidth
* 1 x IPv4

€42 p/YEAR https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=125


<hr/>


**6 GB Ram**

* 2 vCPU Cores

* 150 GB Disk **Doubled to 300GB after provisioned**
* 2000 GB Bandwidth
* 1 x IPv4
* 1 x /64 IPv6 Subnet

€60 p/YEAR https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=174

<hr/>



**Quick terms and info tl;dr and faq.**

* Tun support = yes 
* Fuse support = yes (See KB)
* NFS support = yes (See KB)
* Full Netfilter = yes (See KB)
* No torrents.
* No tor
* Not crypto activity
* No open proxies
* Do not use a VPN or proxy when ordering
* CPU limits are literally the very first thing in the terms, if you read nothing else read that
* Optional paypal subscriptions
* Can I change my current package to this? No.
* Adult allowed if legal
* Can I get a free DA license, No. only in the UK.
* When will these be available in the UK? Aug 2019
* Special offers with >30% discount do not qualify for refund under the 14 day refund policy.
* Orders from China & Brazil not accepted
* This is available until the end of July or until stock runs out, which ever comes first.
* Can I move my current VZ6 plan to a Virtuozzo7 node? yes put a ticket in.
* Can I combine packages? No.
* Do I need the basic support add-on? if you need to ask perhaps you do yes, however you can buy it at any time later.
* Disk space will be manually updated after provisioning.
